July 29, 1922 D Chadderton Contest
Chadderton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
chadderton-contest
None
Classic Gems No 2
Denton Lane Football Ground, Chadderton, Lancashire
Best soprano - W.Hillyard (Dobcross). Best cornet - J.Platt (Dobcross). Best trombone - J.Bradbury (Dobcross). Best euphonium - E.Calverley (Milnrow). Best horn - ? (Eccles). March contest - 1st Oldham Postal, 2nd Dobcross. 7 bands competed.
Aug. 31, 2013, 7:47 a.m. Sept. 22, 2016, 2:35 p.m.

2 Eccles Borough Band James Dow

4 Royton Robert Cooper
